title: sArasAkSi sadA
sahitya:
sArasAkSi sadA pAhimAm kumAra janani sarasa hrdayE 
parAshakti bAlE sushIlE apAra mahimAspUrtE shivE


caraNam 1    kOT sUryapriyE kOmaLE trikONa nilayE kanaka sadrshE 
kaTI dhrta kAncE salIlE prakAsha suguNa kIrtE umE
    caraNam 2    shyAmakrSNanutE shyAmaLE shrI kAmakOTi pITha sadanE 
sAmagAna lOlE su-shObhE vishAla hrdaya mUrtE shubhE
